title: How to Get the Military Jet in Grand Theft Auto V

steps.title: Head to the base.
steps.content: Head to the base. Near the base, there is a tunnel and a significant slope up to the military base.

steps.title: Get a car.
steps.content: Get a car. To get over the wall, you'll need a good car with a lot of speed.

steps.title: Use the car.
steps.content: Use the car. Drive fast and get over the wall.

steps.title: Find the jet.
steps.content: Find the jet. There is a jet in outside, about halfway down the runway.

steps.title: Get the jet.
steps.content: Get the jet. Fly out of there and stay low.

steps.title: Avoid the police.
steps.content: Avoid the police. When you are low, fly around the mountains until you have no stars.

steps.title: Fly to Trevor's airfield and park in the hangar.
steps.content: Fly to Trevor's airfield and park in the hangar.

steps.title: Save it.
steps.content: Save it. Enjoy a massive jet for future use!
